law.text: From the council membership, the chairman shall name three (3) members, at least two (2) of whom shall be full-time farmers, who, along with the chairman, and the executive director, shall serve as the steering committee. The steering committee shall be responsible for the execution of duties and functions assigned to the council.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 447, sec. 20, effective April 12, 1982. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 53, sec. 5. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 87, sec. 4(4).
